ai
Class GameTreeEvaluator

java.lang.Object
  ai.Evaluator
      ai.GameTreeEvaluator

 class GameTreeEvaluator
extends Evaluator

Evaluates a game situation by building up a game tree and examining the best possible move within the generated game tree, utilizing an alphabeta algorhithm and iterative tree search.
